channel.title: ERROR WITH PORTFORWARD ! any help!
channel.description:
Hello ; :D i have been working on my sever for bring it up 100% well my sever is done now !
so i was goin post it on R.u.n.e.l.o.c.u.s top list !
well i turned my Run.bat online i have portforward my ip/port [img]http://foto-uploaden.nl/imgs/portforward.png[/img] i also have tryed my local-ip adress 69.162.78.100 and its will not even working i use D-link stick
its says this We could not connect to your server. Are you sure it's online, and that you are not blocking connections from 69.162.78.27 and 69.162.78.26 ?

item.title: ERROR WITH PORTFORWARD ! any help!
item.dc:creator: @dary3113 dary3113
item.description:
@dary3113 wrote:

Control panel > Firewall > add port

Use the port the server is started on for example 43595 and click add

Read full topic

item.title: ERROR WITH PORTFORWARD ! any help!
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

and to your Control Panel firewall also, add the port not a program but port in Exceptions

Read full topic

item.title: ERROR WITH PORTFORWARD ! any help!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

add exception in your firewall, to both the port and the server

Read full topic
